= Programming Guidelines =

== Namespace ==

<code language="c++">
namespace Argon
{

} //Namespace
</code>

== Class Layout ==
<code language="c++">
namespace Argon
{
     class ExampleClass
     {
         public:

         private:

         protected:

     }; //Class
} //Namespace
</code>

== Comments ==
All comments are to be structures with a specific doxygen style, as displayed below.

<code language="c++">
///FUNCTIONNAME(RETURNTYPE)
///
///Quick information about the what the function will do
///
///Param ParamaterName: Quick description of the parameter
RETURNTYPE FUNCTIONNAME(Type ParamaterName);
</code>
